item.title: New Hugo Blog
item.description: I woke up with a mood of refreshing my blog today. I went through the content of my old million-times-hacked-wordpress website and decided to give something new a try. The only requirement I set was my new blog to be not a dynamic website. After some deep 5-min research, I ended up setting up a Jekyll and a Hugo template project. Long story short, I felt more comfortable with Hugo, mainly because I found a really clean and miminal template from Vicky Lai called Call me Sam.
